subtitles: 188105 190273 if you wanna get 'em out of here.
192317 193777 I can pop these, no problem!

221972 223223 I know what you
think you're doing…
223306 224266 If you don't wanna get hurt…
225392 226852 and don't move a fuckin' muscle.

233358 235735 In order to cure,
you must first understand.
244244 245912 What the fuck he's talking about?!
245996 247038 We don't have time for this!
253962 255589 We're gonna get you out of here.

257716 259593 The infection is
in their blood and saliva.

269019 272189 Get it off!
Oh, God! Help me!

283950 284868 What the fuck is
the matter with her?!
295879 297422 We have to kill her now!
940940 942567 Oh, I shouldn't have done that.
1004045 1005254 What the fuck is going on?

1046754 1048130 Please tell me what
the fuck is going on.

1078619 1081539 A man walks into
a bar with a giraffe.

1081622 1085042 They each get pissed.
The giraffe falls over.

1085126 1088087 The man goes to leave.
The barman says, "Oi…
1088170 1090590 you can't leave that lyin' there."
1090673 1093551 He says, "No, it's not a lion.

1105396 1107690 You two should get on
like a house on fire.
1113529 1114572 Well, you're from a hospital, yeah?

1115865 1117908 He's not a doctor.
He's a patient.

1122538 1126459 I was riding a package
from, uh, Farringdon…

1126542 1129587 to Shaftesbury Avenue
when a car cut across me.

1129670 1131547 And then I wake up
today in hospital.

1170252 1173130 And then it wasn't
on the TV anymore.
1173214 1175007 It was in the street outside…
1175091 1177176 it was coming through your windows.
1177259 1181430 It was a virus, an infection.

1181514 1184517 You didn't need a doctor
to tell you that.

1190523 1193025 By the time they tried
to evacuate the cities…
1202284 1205871 And that's when the exodus started.

1216173 1218968 You didn't hear
anything more after that.
1229353 1231731 They're in a bunker or a plane.
1237903 1240948 no TV, no radio, no electricity.
1264180 1265097 Look, I have to find them.
1268142 1269894 What, you'll go and come back, yeah?

1300716 1303427 We'll all go and find
your dead parents together, okay?
1319193 1320569 If you want to slow down…

1348847 1350182 If there's
anyone in there who is…

1504044 1505879 hoping maybe we
could get on a plane…

1505963 1509508 maybe we could buy
our way onto a plane.

1509591 1512803 I remember my dad
had all this cash…
1525774 1530154 I lost my grip on my sister's hand.
1530237 1534658 I remember the ground was soft.
1534742 1536869 I looked down, and I was standing…

1536952 1540205 on all these people,
like a carpet…
1548964 1552050 All you could do was climb…

1552134 1554553 climb over more people.
So I did that…

1554636 1558348 I climbed, and I got up
on top of this kiosk.
1566732 1571236 not my mum or my sister, my dad.
1584208 1586043 to get back to the shop before dark.

1591507 1593133 My room is up at the top.
You two can have that.

1594218 1595803 No, we'll all sleep
in the same room.

1669835 1671879 at the Buxton Summer
Music Festival last July…
1699573 1701992 Give me a drink of that, will you?

1755337 1757339 Did any of the blood
get in your mouth?
1795669 1797212 Do you have any clothes here?
1801675 1802968 Then get them and get dressed.

1838712 1840672 I mean, how did you know
he was infected?

1843133 1844718 It was on me.
It was on you.
1844801 1846511 I didn't know he was infected, okay?

1846595 1848764 He knew.
I could see it in his face.

1851683 1853977 you've got between
10 and 20 seconds to kill them.

1854061 1856646 It might be your brother
or your sister…

1859775 1860859 And just so you know
where you stand…

1860942 1863570 if it happens to you,
I'll do it in a heartbeat.
1868075 1869367 Have you got any plans, Jim?

1869451 1871453 Do you want us to find
a cure and save the world…
1871536 1873789 or just fall in love and fuck?
1876750 1879044 Staying alive's as good as it gets.
1880921 1882714 Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey.
1936726 1939354 What is it about tower blocks…

1941481 1943608 Stop talking.
It's a long way up.

1961835 1965380 Now I do need a break…
by the way.

1984608 1986276 Well, why didn't you
say something before?

1986359 1988236 Well, because I didn't think
you'd give a shit.
1990739 1992324 You've got no fat on you…

1992407 1994910 and all you've
had to eat is sugar…
2002125 2008173 As for sugar, Pepsi or Lilt?

2010383 2013220 Actually, I did have
a can of Tango somewhere.
2147854 2150315 Calls for a celebration, I'd say.
2150398 2151941 Why don't you all sit down…

2152025 2155820 and, uh, Hannah, what
have we got to offer?
2155904 2158490 We've got Mum's crème de menthe.

2172962 2175840 No, the good ones.
It's a celebration.

2198530 2201241 I know it isn't much,
but, well, cheers.
2230478 2232814 Sorry we couldn't spare the water.

2237652 2239320 Afraid you'll have
to use the bucket.

2246369 2249247 Have to empty it
each morning, you know.
2249330 2250832 Just chuck it over the balcony.

2269476 2273688 Um, no, I'll take
the living room. It's fine.
2309891 2312018 So what do you make of them?

2315104 2317023 Probably need us
more than we need them.
2330411 2331412 but you should be more concerned…

2331496 2334040 about whether
they're gonna slow you down.

2342340 2344926 Then you're gonna wind up
getting yourself killed.
2361526 2363361 you think I don't get it…
2363444 2365238 but, um, I do get it.
2367282 2368867 And I know I'd be dead already…

2403234 2404902 We lost water pressure
3 weeks ago.

2404986 2406321 For a while,
I thought we'd be okay…
2406404 2407739 with the water in the other flats…

2409240 2411993 but it vanishes so quick,
you wouldn't believe.
2429344 2430929 You can set up a plastic sheet…

2433973 2438061 I saw it on TV once,
but I can't make it work.

2453493 2456996 Jim, we're not gonna
be able to stay here.

2465713 2467715 There haven't been
any broadcasts for weeks.
2470718 2473846 The answer to infection is here.

2473930 2476974 If you can hear this,
you're not alone.
2482063 2483898 We are soldiers, and we are armed.

2502083 2504460 but this is where
it's telling us to go.

2509966 2512927 we might need
2, 3 days to get up there.
2522353 2524355 Me and Hannah do need you…
2529652 2531029 if it's just the two of us.

2532530 2534282 Hannah'd be alone.
I couldn't risk it…

2537201 2539037 If it's a recording,
for all we know…
2539120 2541414 the soldiers who made it are dead.

2542623 2544917 And that stuff
about the answer to infection…

2545001 2547170 I mean, there is no answer
to infection.

2547253 2549172 It's already done pretty much
all the damage it can.
2550256 2552633 Maybe they've got nothing at all.

2552717 2554427 Well, the only way to
find out is to reach them!

2560725 2563978 and anyway, it isn't
true what Dad said.

2564062 2566731 You need us just the
same as we need you.

2570193 2572320 and we'll never be
safe in the cities.
2572403 2573654 The soldiers could keep us safe.
2575573 2578951 So we have to try and get there.
2593925 2596177 I don't take checks or credit cards.
2625706 2626707 Well, it's the most direct route…
2626791 2627834 to the other side of the river.
2627917 2629043 No, no, no, then we should take…
2630169 2631546 the one that's in broad daylight…
2650481 2653192 No, see, this is a really shit idea.

2654735 2657488 Because it's really
obviously a shit idea.

2657572 2659699 So, we're just gonna
drive into a tunnel…

2659782 2662285 full of fuckin' smashed
cars and broken glass.

2662368 2664954 It's just really fucking
obviously a shit idea!

2700114 2702617 World's worst place
to get a flat, huh?
2703910 2705369 I think we better do this quick.

2708956 2711083 I've got the wheel.
You're on the jack.

2725723 2727099 Hey, did you hear that?
Hey, hey.

2774855 2777650 Don't look at them!
Don't look at them!

2777733 2780444 I can see them!
They're coming! Aah!

2792832 2794208 — All right!
— Get it on, Hannah!

2806762 2810016 Get in the cab!
Get in the cab!

2887134 2890471 And don't take anything
that needs to be cooked, okay?
2890554 2891931 I think you can eat that raw.

2899855 2901649 If I never see
another chocolate bar again…

2904944 2907363 Not counting Terry's
chocolate orange, of course!

2920709 2923504 Takes out the fire,
but leaves in the warmth.

2978893 2981896 Either we do this now,
or we're walking.

3034323 3036784 Like going on holidays
with your fuckin' aunt.
3136091 3137343 No. Let's get out of here.
3213836 3216463 I can, like, taste the vitamin "C."
3217589 3221218 Okay, the raisins are still moist.

3280819 3281904 Do you know
what I was thinking?

3281987 3282988 You were thinking
that you'll never hear…

3283071 3285365 another piece of
original music ever again.

3290787 3294583 or see a film that hasn't
already been shot.
3299004 3302341 Urn, that's what you were thinking.
3305719 3309014 I was thinking I was wrong.
3330911 3332120 I was wrong when I said…

3332204 3334915 that staying alive
is as good as it gets.
3338585 3341004 You see, that's what I was thinking.

3359773 3361650 Think we better stay here
for the night.

3390470 3394558 Selena didn't seem
to have any trouble.
3401898 3403066 How did you get to sleep?

3412910 3414244 a hell of a prescription
for that lot.

3421418 3424171 Not only will we be able
to get to sleep…

3424254 3426298 but if we're attacked
in the middle of the night…

3527399 3529026 You're having a bad dream,
that's all.

3590253 3592756 Maybe stop
at a pub along the way?

3615403 3618573 …We can feed you
and we can protect you.
3630669 3633547 The answer to infection is here.
3675547 3677132 No fire crews to put it out.

4083496 4085790 Well, we've got beds
with clean sheets…

4085873 4088543 and a boiler
that produces hot water…
4088626 4090920 so you can all have a shower.
4091004 4092088 You look like you need one.
4115695 4117447 I've got loads of cooking to do.
4128333 4129792 Well, she's lost her dad, Jim.

4143681 4145099 No, don't do that.
Don't do that. Don't…
4145183 4146309 Come on, come on, come on, come on.

4151230 4153024 Look, Hannah is
what Frank said she is, okay?

4154901 4156194 and she'll cope
just like I'll cope…

4157320 4160114 I don't want her
to have to fucking cope.
4161366 4163910 I want her to be okay.

4165536 4167663 When Hannah had her dad,
it was okay.

4167747 4170500 It was okay for them,
and it was okay for us.

4214210 4215628 You were hoping
for a full brigade…
4230643 4233938 Well, as I said before, it's here…

4234021 4236023 though it may not be
quite what you imagined.

4236107 4237984 Just feel very lucky
to have found you.

4242238 4244323 The surrounding area
is teeming with them.

4259046 4262425 which we've rigged up
to a generator…
4265178 4266596 and we've been lacing the ground…
4266679 4269307 with trip wires and land mines.
4269390 4271100 You wouldn't want to mow the lawn…
4271184 4272769 but if they get in, we hear them.
4278941 4280902 our real job is to rebuild…
4293331 4294832 A bit of Kendal Mint Cake, right?

4294916 4296042 Well, wait.
Now, don't be throwing it.

4332245 4333913 Mitchell managed
to knock him out cold…
4333996 4335289 and we got a chain around his neck.

4344924 4347885 The idea was to learn
something about infection…

4371784 4374912 He's telling me
he'll never bake bread…

4387633 4389385 he'll tell me how long
the infected take…

4422501 4424754 Will there be chips
or jacket spuds?

4424837 4427757 Will there be salad
or frozen peas?
4431802 4434263 You'll have to wait and see
4470132 4472301 I was going to propose a toast…

4472385 4474720 but this omelet
will do just as well.

4495157 4497576 I thought the salt
might cover the taste, sir.

4505334 4507336 I don't suppose
you can cook, can you?

4509255 4510840 I can't tell you
how badly we need…

4510923 4512842 someone with a little
flair in the kitchen.
4523602 4525563 I mean, look at him, eh?
4526647 4528023 for Marks and Spencer's to reopen.

4530693 4532486 Well, I think
Bell's got a point.

4534113 4537283 If you look at the whole
life of the planet…

4540619 4543539 has only been around
for a few blinks of an eye.

4543622 4546208 So if the infection
wipes us all out…
4547793 4550046 that is a return to normality.
4557720 4559388 have you met our new-age sergeant?
4563726 4566187 exactly why did you join the army…
4578324 4579408 which is much what I saw…
4583204 4584830 As far back as I care to remember…

4588876 4591170 puts us in a state
of normality right now.
4607645 4610397 I want to bury my dad.

4610481 4612608 He's one of the people
you're talking about.

4625204 4626789 Come on! Let's go!
Come on, move!
4671500 4672793 What do you want, a fucking sweetie?

4691770 4694106 I ain't ever seen that
in my fucking life!

4718213 4721008 you ain't gonna
be needing this anymore.

4722426 4724220 'Cause you got me
to protect you now.

4726472 4729016 You wanna get your hands
on a really big chopper…
4729099 4731435 well, you just come and see me.

4743447 4745241 You don't want to go
picking a fight with me, son.
4770474 4772851 Clear the bodies off the lawn.
4776480 4777606 The rest of you go with him.
4807886 4808804 Since it began, who have you killed?
4862107 4863233 with his gun in his mouth.

4865402 4866737 He said he was going
to kill himself…
4870157 4871575 What could I say to him?

4874578 4876121 or we wait until
they starve to death…

4879374 4882544 What do 9 men do except
wait to die themselves?
4882628 4884463 I moved us from the blockade…
4916870 4918413 Look, we get in the cab, and we go!
4928340 4930509 I'm not gonna let you keep 'em here!
4940769 4942771 I can't get hold of him!
4944857 4946942 I want to give you a chance.
4950863 4953073 but I can't let them go.

4987232 4989485 And that was my favorite
ever joke in The Simpsons.

4991361 4993488 a few hundred miles from
here across the channel…

4998035 5001455 They're sleeping in their
beds next to their wives…

5009838 5013050 when the rest of the fucking
world hasn't even stopped.

5020557 5022893 How could it cross the
mountains and the rivers?
5024811 5026021 And right now TVs are playing…
5026104 5027689 and planes are flying in the sky…
5027773 5028690 and the rest of the world…

5036073 5039952 What would you do with
a diseased little island?

5047292 5050754 There is no infection. It's
just people killing people.

5103015 5105892 You see, I'm gonna
have the black one…
5105976 5108770 and I'm gonna make her squeal.

5110105 5112774 I swear to God it's
gonna end badly for you.

5160739 5161782 You're gonna
let him stick me, are you…
5176922 5177839 What, you wanna shoot me, do you?

5178924 5179883 I'll fuckin' kill you,
you little cunt!

5189935 5191186 I don't see him.
I don't see him!

5260797 5262758 Now, the first thing
we're going do…

5262841 5264259 is make you look
a little more presentable.

5264342 5266803 It so happens that
the lady of the house…
5268930 5271099 which she certainly has no use for.
5272184 5274352 You can't do it to Hannah.

5315936 5318647 You need to leave me
alone with Hannah.
5323652 5325779 Yeah, he wants us to dress up nice.
5325862 5327656 If you want us to get changed…
5327739 5328698 you have to leave the room.

5353765 5357185 Come on, lads.
Let's leave the room.

5381960 5384212 Come on. You eat these.
Eat these.
5384296 5386172 Are you trying to kill me?
5388466 5391511 I'm making you not care. Okay?
5392637 5394055 What the fuck are you doing?

5403231 5405900 Stay here
and put the dresses on.
5413450 5414659 We thought he'd be dead, sir.
5644139 5647267 It sounded like a claymore to me.

5649185 5652313 I'll go and hit the floods,
take a butcher's.
5654065 5657402 keep an eye on him, will you?
5670164 5672834 I think they're having an effect.

5688391 5691519 What are you gonna do
if they don't come back?

5691603 5693980 Would you be the officer
if Henry is dead?
5695523 5696691 Is that the way it works?
5700445 5702989 I don't think they are coming back.
5723551 5725053 We're gonna get out of here.

5725136 5726930 Stay with it, Hannah.
Stay with it.
5752997 5755333 Where the fuck are you going, eh?

5765343 5767679 Well, don't just stand
there, you soppy cunt!
5769055 5771099 You two, in the house. Move!
5791536 5793288 What the fuck are you gonna do now?

5821024 5823484 Defend these stairs
with your fucking life!
6004874 6007126 I haven't got any fucking bullets!
6071315 6073067 It's just you and me now, darling…
6074235 6076070 I'm gonna get you out of here.

6076153 6077321 Then we're gonna find
a nice little…

6079991 6081951 and we'll live
happily ever after, eh?
6083077 6085496 I just need a moment, all right?
6085580 6086956 I just need time to fucking think.
6146932 6149894 That was longer than a heartbeat.
6191602 6193604 But I thought he was biting you.
6198359 6200945 We have to get out of here. Come on.
6321357 6324276 Oh, not the curtains as well.

6394805 6397308 You looked all right
in this, you know.
6421540 6423584 I told you. I heard it.
6473550 6475928 Lads, let's get a helicopter in.
6478097 6481350 Do you think he saw us this time?
